original: @72a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @72a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gzhan gyi lce babs pa dang / sdang ba bzlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: gzhan gyi lce babs pa dang / sdang ba bzlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: A practitioner who is endowed with the commitments and who wishes to ward off the slander and hatred of others

original: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
translated: should erect the maṇḍala of Vajravidāraṇa.

original: cho ga rdzogs par byas la bdag nyid sdig pa ma lus pa yongs su dag par byas te /
analyzed: cho ga rdzogs par byas la bdag nyid sdig pa ma lus pa yongs su dag par byas te /
translated: Having completed the rite, he should purify himself of all sins.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: He should supplicate the Blessed One, Vajravidāraṇa.

original: gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste /
analyzed: gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste /
translated: He should offer one hundred and eight bali offerings.

original: gtor ma re re'i nang du sdang ba rnams ya hi gatstsha zhes gro ga la bris la gzhug / snying po shin tu bsdus pa'i sngags brgya phrag sum cu so lnga /
analyzed: gtor ma re re'i nang du sdang ba rnams ya hi gatstsha zhes gro ga la bris la gzhug / snying po shin tu bsdus pa'i sngags brgya phrag sum cu so lnga /
translated: In each bali offering, he should insert a piece of birch bark inscribed with “yaḥ haḥ” of those who hate, and recite the extremely concise essence mantra thirty-five hundred times.

original: spru ma dang mkhan pa dang glang ma dang shug pa'i lo ma la bzlas la /
analyzed: spru ma dang mkhan pa dang glang ma dang shug pa'i lo ma la bzlas la /
translated: He should recite the mantra on pine needles, juniper needles, and birch leaves,

original: gzhan gyi du bsam slebs par yul kun du du bo chen po btang ;
analyzed: gzhan gyi du bsam slebs par yul kun du du bo chen po btang ;
translated: and he should send out great smoke in all directions.

original: tshon rtsi lnga'i phye ma la sngags bzlas la rlung chen po byung dus su yul kun khyab par gtor ro //
analyzed: tshon rtsi lnga'i phye ma la sngags bzlas la rlung chen po byung dus su yul kun khyab par gtor ro //
translated: Recite the mantra over the five-colored powder and scatter it everywhere in the land when a great wind arises.

original: des ni gzhan gyi lce babs pa rgyun 'chad do //
analyzed: des ni gzhan gyi lce babs pa rgyun 'chad do //
translated: By that, the descent of the tongue of others will be interrupted.

original: gzhan gyi lce 'bab pa bzlog pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gzhan gyi lce 'bab pa bzlog pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Repelling the Descent of the Tongue of Others
